thread.title: Feds to require drone owners to register
thread.title_full: Feds to require drone owners to register - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Feds to require drone owners to register
text:
(CNN) - If you own a drone, you may have to let the federal government know about it.
Monday, the U.S. Department of Transportation is expected to announce the formation of a task force on drones.
Their duties reportedly include the creation of a policy that requires anyone who buys a drone to register with the department.
This follows a number of high-profile security incidents involving drones.
Currently, only commercial drone users are required to register their drone aircraft with the Federal Aviation Administration.
